content: **knitted shawl in drops flora the piece is worked top down with honeycomb and relief-pattern ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see even fall hat pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern fl-076 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** height measured down the middle = approx 29 cm width measured along the top = 87 cm **materials** drops flora from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 22 white fog needles drops circular needle size 3 mm length 80 cm drops cable needle **knitting gauge** 26 stitches in width and 51 row in height with garter stitch = 10 x 10 cm 34 stitches with honeycomb pattern = 10 cm in width note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/234-36-even-fall-hat
